name: Sopa de lentejas
description: /'Lentil soup'/ Simple and clear version of a classic lentil soup. In the canaries, soups are very thin because anything thicker takes the name of 'potaje' instead. Not the case on the Spanish Peninsula.

ingredients: Lentils (worth the bottom of a deep kitchen plate)

instructions: - Bring to a boil the water, pinch of salt and lentils.
- Add very finely diced, potato/sweet potato in chunks, the oil, paprika and leave on a simmer 50-60'.
- Manually correct for salt in the meantime. Taste and slowly add until it feels right. Remember bland food can be always fixed, salty food can't.
